item.description:
MEETING FOR PRESENTERS OR THOSE INTERESTED IN PRESENTING:

I decided to schedule this pre event planning meeting so presenters can have apreliminary discussion and figure out how to coordinate their presentations.

Looking for people to volunteer for a fun competitive presentation on the most popular CMS (Content Management Systems)used by web developers featuring:

* Wordpress - Scott
* Drupal - Rick and Josh (SEO aspects) and Scott (writing modules)

* Joomla - Ross
* Expression Engine - ???

* create your own with PHP programming - Gabe
* create your own using Ruby on Rails from a CMS standpoint - Joe (probably)

and

* Photoshop wizard to create promotion photo - Nick (photoshop the various CMS logos onto the fronts of a group of wrestlers to use for promoting the event)

I think the reception to this kind of event will be much interest and enthusiasm in the web development
community.... and I am excited to help host it.
* one idea: CMS smackdown round one (with presentations at intro level) and CMS
smackdown round two (with presentations at the intermediate level).

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Pre-event planning meeting for CMS Smackdown presenters
